posts.post_title: For Sale T206 Mathewson and Johnson SGC
posts.post_content:
For sale a pair of T206 HOFers in mid grade. The price below include shipping. Please email [url]wiseguycards@gmail.com[/url] or shoot me a PM if you are interested or have any questions. High resolutions scans of the back of each card are available upon request. 

•T206 Christy Mathewson White Cap SGC 5 $4150
•T206 Walter Johnson Pitching SGC 4 $3350
